relation: Great for these types of students
Great for all students. Young and old adults.
Shops and restaurants located near the campus
Lots of different programs. Fair in state tuition. Convenient locations around the state.
pageTitle: Nashville State Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 02/11/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 33 Alicia from Tennessee Ridge, TN Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck they have classes online or on campus. they also have campuses in many cities. all the classes are pretty cheap and the more classes you take the better the prices. What to do for fun they have gatherings and extra functions on the event calendar so you can keep up with them on a monthly basis. Food and Dining there are nearby restaurants. Dorm Life i don't live in the dorm. Academic Rigor there are a variety of great classes and all our very challenging. you are sure to learn the best. Tips for prospective students make sure you get your pathway guide so you can pick the right classes you need. In three sentences this college is one of kind. helpful advisers and great selection of classes. would be my first pick any day!! Login to rate or flag the reviews Camellia from Nashville, TN
